ModMetaData.name: Better Terrain
ModMetaData.author: Tim
ModMetaData.description:
Better Terrain for Rimworld. 0.0615 This. 0.061 better hard stone (renamed to Mountain) scattering. Recolored a couple rocks to be easier to pick out from hard stone. 0.06 stone chunks are placed behind trees! people and animals are too for testings sake, feedback plz. updating art in Tropical Forest, 1/2~ way done atm. 15%~ more mountains in mountainous terrain
Finished: Temperate Forest Functional:Arid Shrublands, Boreal Forest, Tropical Forest, Tundra.
